meanings.definition: Relating to the phoneme or the phonemic system of a language.
meanings.sent1: The phonemic differences between the two languages were easy to identify.
meanings.sent2: Her understanding of phonemic patterns helped her learn new words quickly.
meanings.sent3: The phonemic cat tried to meow like a dog, causing confusion.
meanings.sent4: The phonemic essence of the song resonated deeply with the audience.
meanings.sent5: The phonemic colors of the painting created a harmonious blend.

meanings.sent1: The phonemic study group met every Tuesday to discuss language sounds.
meanings.sent2: His phonemic research contributed significantly to linguistic studies.
meanings.sent3: The phonemic joke about vowels and consonants made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her phonemic approach to teaching language was innovative and effective.
meanings.sent5: The phonemic analysis revealed interesting patterns in speech.
